Hey! That's really unneccessary. I just read through 59 IC posts and I'm really happy about that. Lets not ruin it with an OOC argument!

::Cyndro::

Cyndro was listening to Devil Gigatron through the nanobots in the ground, trying not to laugh. He gets ready to fire at any moment, just in case things go from funny to dangerous.
